stimulusHtml: The chordal seventh in measure 17 is circled. Which of the following describes how the seventh is resolved?

features.html: The following question is based on the following excerpt from a keyboard piece in C major.

choicesHtml: It resolves upward on beat three of measure 17.
It resolves upward on beat three of measure 18.
It is retained in the same voice until it resolves downward to the B in measure 18.
It is retained in the same voice until it resolves downward to the B-flat in measure 20.
